mapper.insert: insert into tb_cart(id, pid, num, money) values(#{id}, #{pid}, #{num}, #{money})
mapper.update: update tb_cart set num=#{num}, money=#{money} where id=#{id} and pid=#{pid}
mapper.delete: delete from tb_cart where id=#{uid} and pid=#{pid}
mapper.select: select * from tb_cart where id = #{uid} and pid = #{pid}
